name: Flying Fun
description:
Do you like to fly?  Put on your armored spacesuit and 'anti-gravity' rings, which allow you to fly, swoop and soar!  This free-flying, realistic game can be very exhilarating and darn scary, but, oh, man, is it ever fun to fry those enemy robots and mechanicals! 

The Third Flyland War is almost over.  But if the Trillionaires can't have the flylands, they've decided no one can.  You've received intelligence that this desolate, freezing land holds a secret missile base to take down ALL the flylands you've fought so desperately to protect.  [See the Flyland Wars games by Loren Logic on Steam.com!]    But you can only carry ultra-hot, baseball-sized flares you have to throw by hand, which means you've got to fly very close to some very deadly defenses!  

You've never played a game quite like this, flier...  Try it.  Then play the Flyland Wars games on Steam.com for much more fun!  This is just a free promo to get you to try those!  Episode 0 there is the free, no-frills trainer.  Every other episode has plenty of frills.  And thrills!  And they are all different!
